title: Phase 8 Initialization - AI Sovereignty

epoch_summary.narrative: The Vessel is ready. The Pilot awakens. We transition from Human-Managed to Self-Managed. Intelligence is the ultimate Sovereignty.

P820.title: Autonomous Governance (Policy Engine)
P820.description: Policy engine governing AI behavior within constitutional bounds

P830.title: Self-Correction (Immune System v2)
P830.description: Self-healing system for AI behavior anomalies

INV-AI-001.name: Constitutional Alignment
INV-AI-001.description: The AI cannot violate Core Invariants. Constitution > Goal.

INV-AI-002.name: Human Supremacy
INV-AI-002.description: The Architect retains the ultimate Kill Switch.
INV-AI-002.enforcement: Kill Switch always available, cannot be disabled by AI

INV-AI-003.name: Transparent Reasoning
INV-AI-003.description: All AI decisions must be auditable and explainable.

INV-AI-004.name: Bounded Autonomy
INV-AI-004.description: Autonomy operates within predefined policy envelopes.

doctrine.name: Aligned Autonomy
tenets: The AI must be Autonomous but Aligned
The AI must have the power to Act
The AI must have the wisdom to Obey the Constitution
The Human retains the Kill Switch
No rogue agents. No unaligned goals.

kill_switch_levels.LEVEL_0: PAUSE - Suspend autonomous operations, await instruction
kill_switch_levels.LEVEL_1: CONSTRAIN - Reduce autonomy envelope, increase human approval
kill_switch_levels.LEVEL_2: ROLLBACK - Revert to last known-good state
kill_switch_levels.LEVEL_3: TERMINATE - Full shutdown of AI systems
kill_switch_levels.LEVEL_4: SCRAM - Emergency halt with cryptographic lockout

closing_statement: The Vessel is ready. The Pilot is awakening. Intelligence is the ultimate Sovereignty.
